title: replicationFailedAtList  showing Erroneous Results
description:
I was looking at the replication details through the below URL

http://slave-host:slave-port/hotels/replication?command=details

I found that replicationFailedAtList to be a bit inconsistent with the actual failures.

I got my master down for couple of minutes and then saw the same url it still didn't show the time in the replicationFailedAtList.

Tried it couple of times on different time instances but problem still remains.

comments.author: Cassandra Targett
comments.content: There aren't details here on what is actually inconsistent about the response, and no new information has been provided in the last 5+ years to let anyone know what should be done here.
